control.visible: Player.HasMedia + ![Control.HasFocus(510) | Control.HasFocus(2512) | ControlGroup(512).HasFocus | Control.HasFocus(5100) | Control.HasFocus(5200) | Control.HasFocus(5300) | String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),weather) | String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),settings) | Skin.HasSetting(nonowplayingpanel) | Skin.HasSetting(highermainmenu) + Skin.HasSetting(submode)] + !String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),extras)

control.onclick: RunScript(script.skin.helper.service,action=setskinsetting,setting=$INFO[Container(9000).ListItem.Property(name)].widgets,header=Widget Chooser,simple to set your favorite widget)

control.visible: Skin.HasSetting(extra_extra) + [Control.HasFocus(2518) | Control.HasFocus(2510) | Control.HasFocus(2511) | Control.HasFocus(2512) | Control.HasFocus(2513) | Control.HasFocus(2514) | Control.HasFocus(2515) | Control.HasFocus(2516) | Control.HasFocus(2517)]

item.onclick: RunScript(script.skin.helper.service,action=setskinsetting,setting=$INFO[Container(9000).ListItem.Property(name)].widgets,header=Widget Chooser,simple to set your favorite widget)

item.label: Choose content for 1L

control.visible: Control.HasFocus(9000) + [String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),movie) + Library.HasContent(Movies) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),tvshow) + Library.HasContent(TVShows) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),concert) + Library.HasContent(MusicVideos) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),music) + Library.HasContent(Music) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),favourites) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),pictures) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),live) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),radio) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),program) + !String.IsEmpty(Window(0).Property(Favourite.1.Name)) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),vpl) | String.Contains(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),apl)] + ![Player.HasMedia + [System.IdleTime(8) | Skin.HasSetting(highermainmenu)] | Skin.HasSetting(nohometotals) | Skin.HasSetting(highertotals) + [Window.IsVisible(volumebar) | Window.IsVisible(notification) | Library.IsScanningVideo | Library.IsScanningMusic | Window.IsVisible(614)]]

![Skin.HasSetting(nohometime) | [Skin.HasSetting(highermainmenu) + !Skin.HasSetting(highertime)] + [Control.HasFocus(510) | ControlGroup(512).HasFocus] | Skin.HasSetting(highertime) + [Window.IsVisible(volumebar) | Window.IsVisible(notification) | Library.IsScanningVideo | Library.IsScanningMusic | Window.IsVisible(614)] | !Skin.HasSetting(highertime) + Control.IsVisible(604)]

control.label: $VAR[value_mainmenu_label]
control.visible: Control.HasFocus(510) | Control.HasFocus(2517) | Control.HasFocus(2518) | Control.HasFocus(2510) | Control.HasFocus(2511) | Control.HasFocus(2512) | Control.HasFocus(2513) | Control.HasFocus(2514) | Control.HasFocus(2515) | Control.HasFocus(2516) | Control.HasFocus(1000)

include.condition: Control.HasFocus(510) | Control.HasFocus(513) | Control.HasFocus(514) | Control.HasFocus(515) | Control.HasFocus(517) | Control.HasFocus(1000)

animation.condition: Control.HasFocus(510) | Control.HasFocus(513) | Control.HasFocus(514) | Control.HasFocus(515) | Control.HasFocus(517) | Control.HasFocus(1000)

control.visible: Control.HasFocus(510) | Control.HasFocus(513) | Control.HasFocus(514) | Control.HasFocus(515) | Control.HasFocus(517) | Control.HasFocus(1000)
